ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by <unbreak>38%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>400</unbreak> extra HP.
ItemBGDesc: A common medicine used by adventurers to quickly seal wounds with adhesive foam.\n\n"In the past, all medical breakthroughs were made with the sweat and blood of the pioneers in this field. Now, with the help of Healing Spray, only sweat is needed!"
